body:
maglev/maglev-ir.h and maglev/maglev-ir.cc: IR node classes and GenerateCode/SetValueLocationConstraints implementations for nodes relevant to array fast paths and checks. Notable nodes and locations:
- CheckMaps, CheckMapsWithMigrationAndDeopt, CheckMapsWithAlreadyLoadedMap: class definitions in maglev-ir.h (lines ~7362+). GenerateCode in maglev-ir.cc (~2350+).
- CheckValue, CheckValueEqualsInt32, CheckValueEqualsString, CheckInstanceType: definitions in maglev-ir.h (~7470+ and ~7729+). GenerateCode in maglev-ir.cc (~3720+ and ~3833+).
- CheckNotHole: used for hole checks (~BuildCheckNotHole in graph-builder). GenerateCode in maglev-ir.cc (~4133+).
- EnsureWritableFastElements and MaybeGrowFastElements: definitions in maglev-ir.h (~9033+, ~9090+) and GenerateCode in maglev-ir.cc (~4765+, ~4791+). They call builtins GrowFastDoubleElements/GrowFastSmiOrObjectElements and CopyFastSmiOrObjectElements.
- LoadFixedArrayElement, LoadFixedDoubleArrayElement, StoreFixedArrayElement, StoreFixedDoubleArrayElement: definitions in maglev-ir.h (~9002+, 9190+, 9126+, 9290+). GenerateCode in maglev-ir.cc (~3215+, ~3237+, ~3299+, ~3315+). These emit MaglevAssembler Load/Store helpers that map to platform-specific sequences.
- ConvertHoleToUndefined: def at maglev-ir.h (~11602+) and generation in maglev-ir.cc (~4153+).
- CallBuiltin and CallKnownJSFunction: definitions around maglev-ir.h (~10789+, 11204+) and generate code in maglev-ir.cc (~6810+, ~6527+).
- Deopt reasons: DeoptimizeReason enums used across maglev-ir.cc (~various lines) e.g., kHole, kWrongMap, kArrayLengthChanged, kOutOfBounds, kNotASmi, kNotInt32, kNotANumber, etc. Recorded where nodes call __ GetDeoptLabel or EmitEagerDeopt.
Explanation: This RAG entry points to the IR nodes used in the lowering chain and where they emit deopts. It links to the methods that generate machine code for loads/stores, grow/ensure logic, and calls into builtins.
explanation: IR nodes central to array pop/push specialization and deoptimization reasons, including where code generation emits deopts.
